policy: For all cash payments. Must be exact change. Do not split a single fee into multiple payments.
For checks received at the front counter or through the mail. Do not split a single fee into multiple payments.
For card transactions at the front counter. Do not split a single fee into multiple payments.
For online card transactions. Do not split a single fee into multiple payments.
For projects on Yolo County property. Do not split a single fee into multiple payments.
All refunds must be approved by management and fiscal.
